Production deployment and Server Management (Linux-Ubuntu)
Project Management
System Architecturing and Implementation (ERP, CMS, CRM)

Managing Reports and Documentation of the finding and researches for the projects

Using web technology like HTML5, CSS3, Javascript/JQuery to develop dynamic web applications as well as using server side scripting like python and php with mySQL to create data-driven web services. Used several cutting edge javascript library and framework in creating the web products such as WebGL(ThreeJs) and highstockJS.
Developed various in-house projects for researching the possibility of using technology like Zigbee and Arduino in consumer ready products
Project Prototyping (Smart Aquarium, In-Door GPS Research), Wireless Charging)
